title: Bachelor of Applied Science in Information Technology
description: The B.A.S. at KSU can prepare you for many solid careers, from software developers and programmers to cybersecurity specialists. It can be an excellent stepping stone to more advanced degrees and career opportunities in the computer technology field. You will develop the skills needed to design, implement and maintain computer systems and networks for data processing and distribution.
careers: Network Specialist, Database Specialist, IT Professional, Web Design
